mapper.select: SELECT o.cid AS cid, concat(c.serial, '-', c.name) cname, sum(num) AS sum, ifnull(i.serial, '无') AS item_serial FROM orders o, order_item i, custom c WHERE o.id = i.oid AND c.id = o.cid AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderdate, '%Y') = #{year} AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderdate, '%m') = #{month} GROUP BY o.cid, i.serial;
SELECT date_format(o.orderdate, '%Y-%m') AS ym, sum(num) AS sum FROM orders o, order_item i WHERE o.id = i.oid AND o.cid = #{cid} GROUP BY o.cid, date_format(o.orderdate, '%Y-%m');

# 选择指定年份的产品分月销售数和利润 SELECT ifnull(i.serial, '无编号') AS serial, date_format(o.orderdate, '%Y-%m') AS ym, sum(i.num * i.pack) AS num, sum(i.price * i.num * i.pack) AS price FROM orders o, order_item i WHERE o.id = i.oid AND date_format(o.orderdate, '%Y') = #{year} GROUP BY ifnull(i.serial, '无编号'), date_format(o.orderdate, '%Y-%m');
